Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
HQ \HQ\ n. [acronym] Headquarters, the place from which a commander performs the functions of command.
Syn: headquarters, military headquarters. [WordNet 1.5]

HQ n : (usually plural) the military installation from which a commander performs the functions of command; "the general's headquarters were a couple of large tents" [syn: {headquarters}, {military headquarters}]
